title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente
Fry pancetta until crispy
Mix eggs and grated cheese in a bowl
Drain pasta and reserve some pasta water
Combine hot pasta with egg mixture quickly
Add pancetta and lots of black pepper
Add pasta water if needed for creaminess

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour
Grill chicken until charred, set aside
Sauté onions, garlic, ginger until soft
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy
Blend sauce until smooth, return to pan
Add cream and butter, simmer
Add chicken and cook for 10 minutes
Serve with rice or naan

title: Classic Beef Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and special sauce in a brioche bun.
instructions: Form beef into 4 patties, season with salt and pepper
Cook patties on grill for 4-5 minutes each side
Add cheese in last minute to melt
Toast buns until golden
Spread sauce on bottom bun
Layer lettuce, patty, tomato, onion
Top with bun and serve

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Fresh mixed vegetables stir-fried in a savory garlic ginger sauce.
instructions: Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch for sauce
Heat wok with oil
Stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant
Add vegetables, stir-fry for 3-4 minutes
Pour sauce and cook until thickened
Serve hot with rice

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Cream butter and sugars until fluffy
Add eggs and vanilla, mix well
Combine flour and baking soda
Mix dry ingredients into wet
Fold in chocolate chips
Chill dough for 30 minutes
Bake at 375°F for 10-12 minutes
Cool on wire rack
